text: Malaa, David gaa hana gi Baal Perazim, deenei di gowaa ne haga magedaa digaula go mee. Gei mee ga helekai, “Dimaadua dela ne daaligi ogu hagadaumee i ogu mua, gadoo be di labagee e haga bongoo di abaaba o di monowai.” Deenei laa di gowaa deelaa gu haga ingoo bolo Baal Perazim.5.20 Baal Perazim, di ingoo deenei dono hadinga i nnelekai Hebrew boloo, “Di Tagi o di Haga bongoo”
